title: Private room in 6-bed, 3-bath townhome, graduate hospital
description:
This is a private room available in this 6-bed, 3-bath townhome.
Enjoy living in this gorgeous, recently renovated townhome in Bella Vista! Offering six bedrooms and three bathrooms, this unit is complete with hardwood flooring, soaring 9 ft. ceilings, and recessed lighting throughout. The updated gourmet kitchen boasts granite countertops, a ceramic backsplash, soft-close cabinets, and stainless steel appliances--what more could you ask for? And off of the kitchen, you'll find the lovely back patio, perfect for entertaining or just relaxing with your morning coffee.
This location can't be beat! With a high walk score of 94, you'll be walking distance to all the great restaurants, bars, and shopping of Center City, Rittenhouse Square, Bella Vista, Midtown Village, and Passyunk Square. Sprouts is right around the corner so grocery shopping will be a breeze. You'll also have easy access to the Broad Line and other public transportation with Lombard South Station just a 6-minute walk away.

title: $850 FOR A BEDROOM APARTMENT
description:
A South Philadelphia listing for a third floor 1B apartment located on 11th and Federal crossing. This property features a comfortable floor plan to accommodate a maximum of 1-2 people. It is located within walking distance from East Passyunk Avenue where you can find a variety of restaurants/bars, unique clothing shops, fitness centers, and more. Center City Philadelphia is a short distance away for any professional seeking a property just on the outskirts. The Ellsworth-Federal subway stop is just two blocks away, and bus transit runs conveniently down 11th street daily. Additionally, an Acme and the 9th Street Italian Market are within walking distance. There is no "in-unit" washer/dryer, a cleaner is located down the street on 12th & Federal. This property is perfect for any person or couple looking for an affordable rental in South Philadelphia.
Listed by property owner

title: Gorgeous 3 bedroom Home with Parking, Italian Market- 915 Carpenter
description:
Located in the heart of the Italian market and walkable to some of the most decadent and delicious charcuteries and patisseries, 915 Carpenter is steps away from everything that makes this neighborhood fabulous! Enter into this recently renovated 20-foot-wide home within a gated community with 1 car parking. The first level features a family room with a gas fireplace, powder room, and a mudroom off of the garage. On your way to the second level, notice the hardwood floors throughout and the LED lighting. Southern light pours onto this second floor which holds an open concept kitchen, living room, dining room, and an eat-in kitchen space. Home chefs will be delighted to find modern kitchen features including white shaker cabinets, dark granite counter tops, gas cooking, and stainless-steel appliances. The third level holds three spacious bedrooms, two full bathrooms which feature marble finishes, and laundry conveniently located in the hallway. The primary suite has an ensuite bathroom with a glass enclosure rain shower. For additional entertainment, office, or bedroom space, this home has a very large fully finished basement. You’ll also find a shared courtyard space to gather around with family and friends on a warm summer evening. Around the corner from the delights of Isgro's Bakery, Saloon Restaurant, Dante & Luigi's, and Di Bruno Brothers, and moments from Washington Square and Passyunk Square, you don’t want to miss this opportunity to see this beautiful home.
Tenant is responsible for gas, electric, heat, and water. Property has Central Air. A deposit of 3 months rent to move in is required. Available around July 1st. Maximum of ONE pet for an additional fee of $50/month. Smoke free. Call RACHEL for more information,  show contact info
.

title: Wonderful Brewerytown 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with roof deck!
description:
3108 Clifford St #2 - Immaculate 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with wonderful rooftop deck, W/D, C/A & more!
Basking in the shimmer of natural lighting, this expansive contemporary 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with impeccable amenities on the outskirts of Brewerytown is the perfect opportunity to upgrade your lifestyle! Walk up into an open floor plan with hardwood flooring, delighted by a ton of natural lighting the living room and kitchen sit in synchronicity whilst a balcony sits off to the side beyond sliding glass doors. Two super spacious bedrooms sit on opposite ends of the second level, each with closets, ample natural light and more than enough space to fit a king sized bed and then some. The rear bedroom is connected to an incredible ensuite bathroom with an illuminated LED mirror and bathtub. The third full bathroom sits next to the front bedroom. And up another flight of stairs behind door number 3, is an incredible opportunity where you can watch the sunrise over the skyline or r gaze at the starlit night from your very own private & totally expansive rooftop deck.

The unit's first floor living space has an open-concept design featuring gorgeous bamboo flooring that continues throughout, sky-high ceilings with recessed lighting, large windows allowing sunlight to soak the main living space and a half bathroom. The sleek and stylish kitchen is equipped with trend-setting cabinetry, sea glass subway tile backsplash, GE stainless steel appliances and an incredibly spacious kitchen island. The first bedroom suite is complete with a spacious walk-in closet, recessed lighting, a private balcony with unobstructed skyline views and a private bathroom.
Venture upstairs to access the other 2-bedroom suites and grand laundry room complete with a brand-new, high end W&D (the LG washer is a smart appliance). The front suite features 3 large windows, dual closets and a porcelain tiled bath with a modern floating vanity and stall shower/tub combo! The grand, master suite is located in the rear, completely secluded from the other bedrooms. This space boasts high ceilings, an enormous walk-in closet with amazing storage space, and a resort-style bathroom. A his & her vanity, extra-large, glass walk-in shower and a separate soaking tub complete this note-worthy bathroom. Lastly, the home features a Nest Thermostat as well as a private gated space for trash/recycling. Location is nearby anything and everything you need. Local dining like Bar Hygge, Zorbas, and Ryebread just to name a few. Nearby entertainment like Libertee Grounds, Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row and more. Ample street parking is available and commute with ease with transportation options like the Light Rail, BSL, Kelly Drive and local bus stops.

Apt. 1F, 981 N. 6th St. (1 block south of Girard Ave.)
This is a very nice 1-bedroom micro apartment in the desirable Northern Liberties neighborhood of Philadelphia.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: Brand new Brewerytown 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with parking!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

Central Air/Heat
Washer Dryer
Parking space
2 entrances
Dishwasher
Gas stove
3 full bathrooms
Tons of natural light
